PHP FastCGI Handler.description: Add PHP-FPM FastCGI handler for Apache

Xdebug Session Cookie.prefix: Header add Set-Cookie "XDEBUG_SESSION=start; path=/; SameSite=None; Secure"
body: Header add Set-Cookie "XDEBUG_SESSION=start; path=/; SameSite=None; Secure"
Xdebug Session Cookie.description: Add Xdebug session cookie header for debugging
